name.japanese: サラサラの実 モデル：アホロートル
name.romanized: Sara Sara no Mi, Moderu: Ahorōtoru

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into an axolotl hybrid and a full axolotl at will. Uniquely, this fruit was fed to a slime creature made of poisonous gas.

users.circumstances: Caesar Clown fed the fruit to Smiley, a slime creature made from condensed H2S gas, making it one of the rare cases of an inanimate object consuming a Devil Fruit.

abilityReveals.description: Grants the user the ability to transform into an axolotl, though the specifics are unclear due to Smiley's unique nature as a gas creature.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: The fruit's presence is revealed when Smiley appears as a massive slime creature with Devil Fruit powers.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
User retains vulnerability to standard Devil Fruit weaknesses despite being made of gas

strengths.strength: Grants Devil Fruit powers to inanimate objects when consumed by them
strengths.description: Caesar Clown was able to weaponize a gas creature by feeding it this Devil Fruit.
